message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $180 seems a bit steep.  Would you consider something closer to $120?
I understand you're looking for a better price, Bob. I can do $160, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. What do you think?
I appreciate you coming down a bit, Alice.  How about we meet in the middle at $140?
I can do $140, but I was thinking more along the lines of $145. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale. What do you think?
